Protected Attributes

void * vp_

Detailed Description

Simple subscription publisher.

The subscription publisher that notifies remote listeners with published value updates.

Remote listeners can subscribe and unsubscribe at any time.

Member Function Documentation

- (void) close

Destructor.

The destructor is called by dealloc, but can be invoked explicitly as well if needed. Note: The destructor automatically unregisters the publisher from the agent it was registered at, which might cause hazards if some updates are pending in the incoming message queue.

- (void) dealloc

Finalizer.

Calls close. Normally called automatically by the runtime.

- (YAMI4ValuePublisher *) init

Initializer.

Initializes the subscription publisher that is not registered at any agent.

+ (YAMI4ValuePublisher *) new

Constructor.

Creates the subscription publisher that is not registered at any agent.

- (void) publish: (YAMI4Parameters *)  parameters

Publishes the new value.

Sends the update message to all active listeners with the given value and default (0) priority. See notes for the other publish variant.

- (void) publish: (YAMI4Parameters *)  parameters
priority: (size_t)  priority 

Publishes the new value.

Sends the update message to all active listeners with the given value and priority. In case of any errors or communication problems, the problematic listener is automatically unsubscribed.

Parameters:
parametersNew value that is to be sent as update to all listeners.
priorityThe priority of the update message.
- (void) registerAt: (YAMI4Agent *)  controllingAgent
objectName: (NSString *)  objectName 

Registers the publisher at the given agent.

Parameters:
controllingAgentThe agent which should manage the communication for this publisher.
objectNameThe name of object that should be visible to remote subscribers.
- (void) subscribe: (NSString *)  destinationTarget
destinationObject: (NSString *)  destinationObject 

Subscribes the new listener.

This function is usually called internally as a result of processing the remote "subscribe" message, but can be also used locally if the listener's location is obtained via other means.

Parameters:
destinationTargetTarget of the remote listener.
destinationObjectName of the remote listener's object.
- (struct YAMI4SubscriberInfo *) subscribers: (size_t*)  numOfSubscribers

Returns the information about all active subscribers.

This function allocates the array of YAMI4SubscriberInfo components

  • the caller is responsible for deallocating it with free. The first component of each array entry is a destination target and the second component is a destination object for the given subscriber.
- (void) unsubscribe: (NSString *)  destinationTarget

Unsubscribes the given listener.

Parameters:
destinationTargetTarget of the remote listener.
